description: Navigate a dynamic Mario-themed maze to collect coins while avoiding patrolling Koopas in a race against time.
rationale: This app provides a focused environment for AI agents to learn spatial navigation and pathfinding within a constrained grid system. It targets developers and researchers interested in grid-based movement logic and collision avoidance in a classic arcade setting.
details: The game features a 2D grid-based maze inspired by Super Mario Bros. The player controls a Mario sprite that moves one tile at a time. The objective is to collect all 50 coins scattered throughout the maze. Two Koopa Troopa enemies move in predictable back-and-forth patterns, and touching them resets the player to the start or deducts a life. The maze layout is fixed but coin placement can be randomized. The UI uses a monochrome high-contrast palette with simple vector shapes to represent walls, coins, and characters, making it ideal for machine vision agents.

game_rules.win_condition: Collect all coins within the time limit
game_rules.lose_condition: Time runs out or player loses 3 lives to enemies
game_rules.scoring: 100 points per coin, 1000 bonus for level completion

how_to_play: Use UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT arrow keys to move the player character through the maze tiles. Move onto a coin tile to collect it and increase your score. Avoid tiles occupied by moving Koopa sprites. Complete the collection before the timer reaches zero.
observation_space: 2D integer array representing tile types (0: empty, 1: wall, 2: player, 3: coin, 4: enemy)
